home.parrafo-info: Graduated from the Software and Computer Systems Engineering degree, with a UX/UI designer profile with projects that understand the needs of users

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I graduated from the Bachelor of Software Engineering and Computer Systems, I love design and creating prototypes with the aim of improving the user experience. I aspire to get a job in the world of UX/UI Design and thus gain experience to connect more with the user. I consider myself an empathetic person with extensive knowledge in psychology to understand the way the user thinks.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Mobile app that allows users to easily connect to air conditioning, washing machines and also to the lights in the house.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Mobile app that informs you about the weather conditions such as temperature, rain, snow and wind. Check the forecast for the next ten days.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A mobile app that allows you to book accommodation by comparing prices and travel offers.
